mapper.select: SELECT u.UserCode, u.MultiDisplayName AS MultiDisplayName, a.DeputyCode, a.UseDeputy, a.DeputyName, DATE_FORMAT(a.DeputyFromDate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS DeputyFromDate, DATE_FORMAT(a.DeputyToDate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS DeputyToDate, a.DeputyReason, a.DeputyOption, a.AlertConfig AS Alarm, a.ApprovalPassword, u.LanguageCode, Fn_ComTimeZoneGet_S(#{UR_CODE}) AS TimeZoneDiff, a.UseApprovalPassWord AS UseApprovalPassWord FROM sys_object_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_object_user_approval a ON u.UserCode = a.UserCode WHERE u.UserCode = #{UR_CODE} LIMIT 1;

SELECT jfm.JobFunctionMemberID, jfm.JobFunctionID, jfm.UserCode, u.DisplayName AS UR_Name FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_jobfunctionmember as jfm LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user as u on jfm.UserCode = u.UserCode WHERE jfm.JobFunctionID= #{JobFunctionID}

SELECT jfm.UserCode AS UserCode FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_jobfunctionmember as jfm LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user as u on jfm.UserCode = u.UserCode WHERE jfm.JobFunctionID = ( SELECT JobFunctionID FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_jobfunction jb INNER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.sys_object_domain AS SOD ON SOD.DomainCode = jb.EntCode WHERE JobFunctionCode = #{JobFunctionCode} AND SOD.domainID = #{DomainID} ) AND u.isuse = 'Y'
SELECT UserCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup WHERE DeptCode = (SELECT GroupCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group WHERE GroupCode = #{GroupID})
mapper.update: UPDATE covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_approval SET DeputyCode = #{DeputyCode}, DeputyName = #{DeputyName}, DeputyFromDate = #{DeputyFromDate}, DeputyToDate = #{DeputyToDate}, UseDeputy = #{DeputyYN}, DeputyReason = #{DeputyReason}, DeputyOption = #{DeputyOption} WHERE UserCode = #{UR_Code}

ApprovalPassword = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{aeskey}, SHA2(#{Password},512))), UseApprovalPassWord = #{ApprovalPWUse},
ApprovalPassword = '',
UseApprovalPassWord = #{ApprovalPWUse},
AlertConfig = #{Alarm} WHERE UserCode = #{UR_Code}
